<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2a5c61a0196d2d67313f5b3189974211e6f33562|patch 8.2.2249: termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh>
patch 8.2.2249: termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh

Problem:    Termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh with X forwarding.
Solution:   Set 'mousetime' to a larger value. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7576,
            closes #7563)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2249: termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh · vim/vim@2a5c61a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2249: termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh · vim/vim@2a5c61a
attachments.text: Problem: Termcodes test is flaky when used over ssh with X forwarding. Solution: Set 'mousetime' to a larger value. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7576, closes #7563)

patch 8.2.2248: ASAN error on exit with GUI

Problem:    ASAN error on exit with GUI.
Solution:   Check the window still has lines. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #7573)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4d8c96d4668ac965d4e84b9676fba6d7efe62a32|patch 8.2.2246: cursor keys not recognized at the hit-Enter prompt>
patch 8.2.2246: cursor keys not recognized at the hit-Enter prompt

Problem:    Cursor keys not recognized at the hit-Enter prompt after executing
            an external command.
Solution:   Change the codes for the extra cursor keys. (closes #7562)
            Tune the delays to avoid test flakyness.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/285b15fce164ade8b1537b884cc15aebaa60e9ef|patch 8.2.2245: Vim9: return value of winrestcmd() cannot be executed>
patch 8.2.2245: Vim9: return value of winrestcmd() cannot be executed

Problem:    Vim9: return value of winrestcmd() cannot be executed.
Solution:   Put colons before each range. (closes #7571)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2245: Vim9: return value of winrestcmd() cannot be executed · vim/vim@285b15f

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: return value of winrestcmd() cannot be executed. Solution: Put colons before each range. (closes #7571)
